hero.subtitle: Professional web development and IT services tailored to your needs in Sisak, Croatia. We create responsive websites, optimize for search engines, and provide comprehensive IT solutions.

about.title: About Lemgenda Web Development
about.text1: Lemgenda is a comprehensive digital solutions provider based in Sisak, Croatia, founded and operated by Lem Treursić. We specialize in transforming businesses through cutting-edge technology and creative digital solutions that drive real results.
about.text2: With years of experience in the industry, we understand that every business has unique challenges and opportunities. That's why we take a personalized approach to each project, ensuring that our solutions align perfectly with your business objectives and target audience.
about.customWebDevDesc: We build responsive, mobile-first websites and web applications using modern technologies like React, JavaScript, C#, and .NET. Our focus is on creating fast, secure, and scalable solutions that provide exceptional user experiences.
about.digitalGrowthDesc: Beyond just SEO optimization, we develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies that increase your online visibility, drive qualified traffic, and convert visitors into loyal customers through data-driven approaches.
about.brandIdentityDesc: We create memorable brand identities through professional logo design and comprehensive visual systems. Our designs not only look great but effectively communicate your brand's values and message to your target audience.
about.completeItDesc: From PC maintenance and virus removal to operating system installations and mobile device optimization, we provide comprehensive IT support to keep your technology running smoothly and securely.
about.commitmentText: At Lemgenda, we believe in building long-term partnerships with our clients. We're committed to delivering not just projects, but solutions that grow with your business. Our team stays current with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure you always receive modern, effective solutions.
about.resultsDrivenDesc: Our focus is on delivering measurable results that drive your business forward.
about.timelyDeliveryDesc: We respect deadlines and ensure your project is completed on time.
about.ongoingSupportDesc: We provide continuous support and maintenance to ensure long-term success.

contact.title: Contact Lemgenda for Web Development Services
contact.text: Ready to start your web development project? Get in touch with us today for a free consultation!
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.faq1: How long does it take to get a response to an inquiry?
contact.faq1answer: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours on business days. Urgent inquiries may receive a response even faster.
contact.faq2answer: Yes, we offer free initial consultations via phone, email, or video call to understand your needs.
contact.faq3: Do you work with clients outside of Sisak?
contact.faq3answer: Absolutely! We work with clients throughout Croatia and via online collaboration. Most of our services can be performed completely online.

cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.
cookie.necessaryDesc: Required for the website to function

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take to build a website?
faq.a1: The time required varies depending on project complexity. Simple websites can be completed in 2-3 weeks, while more complex projects may take 6-8 weeks. We provide precise time estimates during consultations.
faq.a2: Yes, we provide complete SEO services including technical SEO optimization, content optimization, loading speed, and local SEO. Our goal is to improve your visibility in search results.
faq.q3: Can you work with existing websites?
faq.a3: Absolutely! We provide upgrade, maintenance, and optimization services for existing websites. We can work with various platforms and technologies.
faq.q4: How much does website development cost?
faq.a4: Prices depend on project complexity, features, and design. We offer free consultations to understand your needs and provide an accurate quote.
faq.q5: Do you offer support after project completion?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer various support and maintenance packages to ensure the long-term success of your website.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy Policy for Lemgenda Web Development. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in compliance with GDPR.
privacy.content:
1. Information We Collect

We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

  • Name and contact information (email, phone number)
  • Company information
  • Project requirements and specifications
  • Communication records
  • Website usage data through cookies

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide and maintain our services
  • Process your requests and projects
  • Send technical notices and support messages
  • Respond to your comments and questions
  • Improve our website and services
  • Send marketing communications (with your consent)

3. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share information with:

  • Service providers who assist in our operations
  • Professional advisors (lawyers, accountants)
  • Law enforcement when required by law

4. Data Retention

We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

5. Your Rights Under GDPR

Under GDPR, you have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate data
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Restrict or object to processing
  • Data portability
  • Withdraw consent

6. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

7. Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.

8. International Data Transfers

Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

9. Children's Privacy

Our services are not directed to individuals under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

10. Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

11. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions, contact us at:

Email: lemgenda.obrt@gmail.com
Phone: +385 95 383 1325

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms of Service for Lemgenda Web Development. Learn about our service agreements, project terms, and client responsibilities.
terms.content:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Lemgenda's services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

2. Services Provided

Lemgenda provides web development, SEO optimization, logo design, and IT services as described on our website.

3. Project Terms

  • All projects require a signed agreement
  • Payment terms are specified in individual project contracts
  • Client is responsible for providing necessary materials and feedback in a timely manner
  • Project timelines are estimates and may vary based on client responsiveness

4. Intellectual Property

Upon full payment, clients receive full ownership of the delivered work, excluding third-party components.

5. Payment Terms

  • 50% deposit required to begin work
  • Balance due upon project completion
  • Late payments may incur interest charges

6. Confidentiality

Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of proprietary information.

7. Limitation of Liability

Lemgenda's liability is limited to the amount paid for services.

8. Termination

Either party may terminate services with written notice.

9. Governing Law

These terms are governed by the laws of Croatia.

10. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of changes.

11. Contact Information

Lemgenda
Ulica Jurja Križanića 6
44000 Sisak, Croatia
Email: lemgenda.obrt@gmail.com
Phone: +385 95 383 1325
